meanings.definition: Package again in a different way.
meanings.sent1: She repackaged the cookies in a colorful box.
meanings.sent2: The company repackaged the product to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: He repackaged the gift so many times, it looked like a game.
meanings.sent4: The artist repackaged reality in a surreal painting.
meanings.sent5: The magician repackaged the trick to make it more impressive.

meanings.definition: Present in a new or different form.
meanings.sent1: The repackaged toy had a shiny new wrapper.
meanings.sent2: The repackaged software included updated features.
meanings.sent3: The repackaged book cover was so bright, it hurt my eyes.
meanings.sent4: Her repackaged outfit was a fresh take on vintage fashion.
meanings.sent5: The repackaged movie poster made the film look exciting.
